idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
from tunepad import *

# PROJECT SETTINGS
project_bpm = 84

# --- Define Reusable Phrases as Functions ---

def go_on_phrase():
    # "...go on" ending for a verse
    playNote(72, beats=4)   # C5 (held)
    rest(2)

def verse_phrase():
    # Melody for one full lyric line of the verse
    playNote(71, beats=1)   # B4
    playNote(72, beats=1)   # C5
    playNote(74, beats=1)   # D5
    playNote(76, beats=1)   # E5
    playNote(78, beats=2)   # F#5 (held)
    playNote(76, beats=1)   # E5
    playNote(74, beats=1)   # D5
    go_on_phrase()

def chorus_a():
    # "Near, far, wherever you are..."
    playNote(67, beats=1)   # G4
    playNote(69, beats=1)   # A4
    playNote(71, beats=1)   # B4
    playNote(72, beats=1)   # C5
    playNote(74, beats=2)   # D5 (held)
    playNote(72, beats=1)   # C5
    playNote(71, beats=1)   # B4
    playNote(69, beats=4)   # A4 (held - "are")

    # "I believe that the heart does go on..."
    playNote(71, beats=1)   # B4
    playNote(72, beats=1)   # C5
    playNote(74, beats=1)   # D5
    playNote(76, beats=1)   # E5
    playNote(78, beats=2)   # F#5 (held)
    playNote(76, beats=1)   # E5
    playNote(74, beats=1)   # D5
    go_on_phrase()

    # "Once more you open the door..."
    playNote(74, beats=1)   # D5
    playNote(72, beats=1)   # C5
    playNote(71, beats=1)   # B4
    playNote(69, beats=1)   # A4
    playNote(67, beats=4)   # G4 (held - "door")

    # "And you're here in my heart..."
    playNote(69, beats=1)   # A4
    playNote(71, beats=1)   # B4
    playNote(72, beats=1)   # C5
    playNote(74, beats=1)   # D5
    playNote(72, beats=2)   # C5
    playNote(71, beats=1)   # B4
    playNote(69, beats=1)   # A4

# ----------------------------------------
# ðŸš€ SONG STRUCTURE ðŸš€
# ----------------------------------------

# --- Verse 1 (2 repetitions of the verse_phrase)
verse_phrase() # "Every night in my dreams..."
verse_phrase() # "Far across the distance..."

# --- Chorus 1
chorus_a()
# Ending part: "And my heart will go on and on"
playNote(67, beats=1)   # G4
playNote(69, beats=1)   # A4
playNote(71, beats=1)   # B4
playNote(72, beats=5)   # C5 (held out)
rest(3) 

# --- Verse 2 (2 repetitions)
verse_phrase() # "Love can touch us one time..."
verse_phrase() # "Love was when I loved you..."

# --- Chorus 2
chorus_a()
# Ending part: "And my heart will go on and on"
playNote(67, beats=1)   # G4
playNote(69, beats=1)   # A4
playNote(71, beats=1)   # B4
playNote(72, beats=5)   # C5 (held out)
rest(3)

# --- Bridge/Outro (Climactic part, higher notes)
# "You're here, there's nothing I fear..." (Higher register)
playNote(79, beats=1)   # G5
playNote(81, beats=1)   # A5
playNote(83, beats=1)   # B5
playNote(84, beats=1)   # C6
playNote(86, beats=2)   # D6 (held)
playNote(84, beats=1)   # C6
playNote(83, beats=1)   # B5
playNote(81, beats=4)   # A5 (held - "fear")

# "And I know that my heart will go on"
playNote(83, beats=1)   # B5
playNote(84, beats=1)   # C6
playNote(86, beats=1)   # D6
playNote(88, beats=1)   # E6
playNote(90, beats=2)   # F#6 (held)
playNote(88, beats=1)   # E6
playNote(86, beats=1)   # D6
playNote(84, beats=4)   # C6 (held - "on")

# "We'll stay forever this way..."
playNote(86, beats=1)   # D6
playNote(84, beats=1)   # C6
playNote(83, beats=1)   # B5
playNote(81, beats=1)   # A5
playNote(79, beats=4)   # G5 (held - "way")

# Final notes: "And my heart will go on and on"
playNote(81, beats=1)   # A5
playNote(83, beats=1)   # B5
playNote(84, beats=1)   # C6
playNote(86, beats=1)   # D6
playNote(84, beats=2)   # C6
playNote(83, beats=1)   # B5
playNote(81, beats=1)   # A5
playNote(79, beats=1)   # G5
playNote(81, beats=1)   # A5
playNote(83, beats=1)   # B5
playNote(84, beats=16)  # C6 (long, sustained ending)

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# New TunePad cell
from tunepad import *


CHORD_DURATION = 4 # Each chord lasts a whole measure (4 beats)

# Function to play the core 4-chord progression
def play_chords():
    # Gm (G, Bb, D) - I minor
    playNote([55, 58, 62], beats=CHORD_DURATION) 
    # Eb Major (Eb, G, Bb) - bVI Major
    playNote([51, 55, 58], beats=CHORD_DURATION)
    # Bb Major (Bb, D, F) - bIII Major
    playNote([58, 62, 65], beats=CHORD_DURATION)
    # F Major (F, A, C) - bVII Major
    playNote([53, 57, 60], beats=CHORD_DURATION)

# Verses and Choruses are 8 sets of this progression
for i in range(8):
    play_chords()

# Hold the final chord for the outro
playNote([55, 58, 62], beats=32) # Gm chord held for a long, fading outro

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# New TunePad cell
from tunepad import *

# Percussion uses instrument number 0 (the drum kit)

# The melody starts with a slow section (32 beats) where we should rest
rest(32)

# Simple, repeating rock beat pattern for the rest of the song
def simple_beat():
    # Kick Drum (note 0) on beats 1 and 3
    playNote(0, beats=1)
    rest(1)
    playNote(0, beats=1)
    rest(1)

    # Snare Drum (note 2) on beats 2 and 4
    rest(1)
    playNote(2, beats=1)
    rest(1)
    playNote(2, beats=1)

# Play the beat 30 times to cover the majority of the rest of the song
for i in range(30):
    simple_beat()
